title: Head of a Horse and a Saddle
medium: Graphite on wove paper, mounted in an album.
description:
Recto: Horizontal sketch of a horse's head at left, with 3 color notations of B, and a saddle drawn perpendicularly at right.

Verso:  Crossed out variations of work "Cossack".
name: Drawing
